name: The All New? Punch-Out!!
overview: This is a hack which replaces the opponents with characters from other games including the arcade version of Punch-out, Super Punch-out, among other games. The referee has been replaced by Wario and the floor tarp has been recolored. The text has been modified to reflect the new content. Little Mac’s trainer has been replaced by Von Kaiser. This hack is based off a trailer called “Team Awesome´s Punch-Out!! Trailer”.
